article.title: U.S. Army Modifies Night Vision Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Orlando, Florida, was awarded a $13,600,000 firm-fixed-price contract modification to procure the reset of modernized target acquisition designation sight/pilot night vision sensor systems.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
